metadata.name: HackTool - SharpUp PrivEsc Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of SharpUp, a tool for local privilege escalation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpup.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('sharpup') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hijackablepaths')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unquotedservicepath')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('processdllhijack')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('modifiableservicebinaries')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('modifiablescheduledtask')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('domaingpppassword')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cachedgpppassword'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of SharpUp, a tool for local privilege escalation
